title: Young Gun Riccitello Matches Vuelta’s Best, Kuss Keeps GC Hopes Alive Despite Heat
content:
'It’s pretty cool to be up there with those guys:' Riccitello climbs to career-best grand tour 6th while defending champion Kuss limits the losses on brutally hot climb.

Read the full article at Young Gun Riccitello Matches Vuelta’s Best, Kuss Keeps GC Hopes Alive Despite Heat on Velo.
author: ahood
